question: Residential construction is expanding in Florida. The expansion has caused fragmentation of habitats. One of the results of the increased construction is a decrease in the number of large predators such as the coyote, black bear, and panther. Which will be the most immediate local result of this fragmentation?
candidate_answers: (A) decrease in middle-sized predators (B) large predators will become extinct (C) increase in population of prey species (D) increase in population of top carnivores
label: B
